1:
I will sing of Yahweh's acts of covenant faithfulness forever.
\q I will proclaim your truthfulness to future generations.
\q
2:
For I have said, "Covenant faithfulness has been established forever;
\q your truthfulness you have established in the heavens."
3:
"I have made a covenant with my chosen one,
\q I have made an oath to David my servant.
\q
4:
I will establish your descendants forever,
\q and I will establish your throne through all generations."
\qs Selah\qs*
6:
For who in the skies can be compared to Yahweh?
\q Who among the sons of the gods is like Yahweh?
7:
He is a God who is greatly honored in the council of the holy ones
\q and is awesome among all who surround him.
\q
8:
Yahweh, God of hosts,
\q who is strong like you, Yahweh?
\q Your truthfulness surrounds you.
10:
You crushed Rahab as one who is killed.
\q You scattered your enemies with your strong arm.
11:
The heavens belong to you, and the earth also.
\q You made the world and all it contains.
\q
12:
You created the north and the south.
\q Tabor and Hermon rejoice in your name.
13:
You have a mighty arm
\q and a strong hand, and your right hand is high.
\q
14:
Righteousness and justice are the foundation of your throne.
\q Covenant faithfulness and trustworthiness come before you.
15:
Blessed are the people who worship you!
\q Yahweh, they walk in the light of your face.
\q
16:
They rejoice in your name all day long,
\q and in your righteousness they exalt you.
17:
You are their majestic strength,
\q and by your favor we are victorious.
\q
18:
For our shield belongs to Yahweh;
\q our king belongs to the Holy One of Israel.
23:
I will crush his enemies before him;
\q I will kill those who hate him.
25:
I will place his hand over the sea
\q and his right hand over the rivers.
\q
26:
He will call out to me, 'You are my Father,
\q my God, and the rock of my salvation.'
27:
I also will place him as my firstborn son,
\q the most exalted of the kings of the earth.
\q
29:
I will make his descendants endure forever
\q and his throne as enduring as the skies above.
30:
If his children forsake my law
\q and disobey my decrees,
\q
31:
if they break my rules
\q and do not keep my commands,
\q
32:
then will I punish their rebellion with a rod
\q and their iniquity with blows.
33:
But I will not remove my steadfast love from him
\q or be unfaithful to my promise.
\q
34:
I will not break my covenant
\q or change the words of my lips.
35:
Once and for all I have
 sworn by my holinessâ€”
\q I will not lie to David:
\q
36:
his descendants will continue forever
\q and his throne as long as the sun before me.
\q
37:
It will be established forever like the moon,
\q the faithful witness in the sky."
\qs Selah\qs*
39:
You have renounced the covenant of your servant.
\q You have desecrated his crown on the ground.
\q
40:
You have broken down all his walls.
\q You have ruined his strongholds.
41:
All who pass by have robbed him.
\q He has become an object of disgust to his neighbors.
\q
43:
You turn back the edge of his sword
\q and have not made him stand when in battle.
45:
You have shortened the days of his youth.
\q You have covered him with shame.
\qs Selah\qs*
46:
How long, Yahweh? Will you hide yourself, forever?
\q How long will your anger burn like fire?
\q
47:
Oh, think about how short my time is,
\q and for what uselessness you have created all the children of mankind!
\q
48:
Who can live and not die,
\q or rescue his own life from the hand of Sheol?
\qs Selah\qs*
49:
Lord, where are your former acts of covenant faithfulness
\q that you swore to David in your truthfulness?
\q
50:
Call to mind, Lord, the mocking directed against your servants
\q and how I bear in my heart so many insults from the nations.
\q
51:
Your enemies hurl insults, Yahweh;
\q they mock the footsteps of your anointed one.
52:
Blessed be Yahweh forever.
\q Amen and Amen.
89:
\m
\d A maschil of Ethan the Ezrahite.
\q
